title: About me
text: The short version: dad, dedicated fullstack hacker, loves sports

A little deeper: Born August 7 1974 in Aarhus, Denmark. Grew up outside Odense. Studied computer science at DTU and Niels Brock CBC. Now live in Roskilde where I enjoy the company of my wife and three kids.
Digging in to programming, mostly C#, MSSQL but now I've found an interesting new adventure exploring the vast opportunities that comes with Javascript.
